name: Conductor (itch) (Mary, lioh, BubGame)
description:
• You are the Conductor. Swing your baton and generate resonate music and flowing animations in an atmospheric world. Follow symbols and glyphs to build your orchestra while the music swells. 
  • Crafted in a week during Brackey's Game Jam 2021, 'Conductor' is the project of a programmer in Japan, a musician in the Czech Republic, and an artist in the US who wanted to evoke a message of positivity; the message that in fact we are stronger together than we are apart. As the player connects strings of notes, musicians populate the screen and lend their melodies to the growing score. By moving the mouse, the player meditatively constructs a soundtrack that reaches its conclusion by utilizing every instrument available.
  • A single player experience, 'Conductor,' while brief, will leave an impression that lingers. 
  • Code: Paku (Mary Phun)

  • Music: Lioh
